com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

Interface KandyChatServiceNotificationListener


  • public interface KandyChatServiceNotificationListener
    This Interface defines a callback to be invoked when a chat received.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChatDelivered(KandyDeliveryAck ackData)
      Called when the other side receives the message.
      void onChatMediaAutoDownloadFailed(IKandyMessage message, int errorCode, String error)
      Called if downloaidng of the media failed
      void onChatMediaAutoDownloadProgress(IKandyMessage message, IKandyTransferProgress progress)
      Called when a media file is downloading, and passes the current progress of downloading, and to which event (message) it belongs
      void onChatMediaAutoDownloadSucceded(IKandyMessage message, Uri path)
      Called when the download completed successfully.
      void onChatReceived(IKandyMessage message, KandyRecordType type)
      Called when a chat message is received.
      void onUserTypingIndicationReceived(KandyTypingIndicationItem typingIndicationItem, KandyRecord sender, KandyRecord destination)
      User typing indication received

      • onChatMediaAutoDownloadProgress

        void onChatMediaAutoDownloadProgress(IKandyMessage message,
                                     IKandyTransferProgress progress)
        Called when a media file is downloading, and passes the current progress of downloading, and to which event (message) it belongs
        Parameters:
        message - The message for which downloading media file
        progress - current progress of the download process [0-100]

      • onChatMediaAutoDownloadFailed

                                   int errorCode,
                                   String error)
        Called if downloaidng of the media failed
        Parameters:
        message - The related message
        error - The error text

      • onChatMediaAutoDownloadSucceded

        void onChatMediaAutoDownloadSucceded(IKandyMessage message,
                                     Uri path)
        Called when the download completed successfully.
        Parameters:
        message - The related message
        fileUri - The uri of the downloaded file on device

      • onUserTypingIndicationReceived

        void onUserTypingIndicationReceived(KandyTypingIndicationItem typingIndicationItem,
                                    KandyRecord sender,
                                    KandyRecord destination)
        User typing indication received
        Parameters:
        typingIndicationItem - Typing indication object describing typing state of sender
        sender - The other user that sent typing indication
        destination - The destination, can be the group there other user is trying to chat
